flgn.config.fogStart.name: Fog Start
flgn.config.fogStart.desc:
The percentage distance from the camera where the fog starts.

The actual distance value for the fog start is equal to this percentage multiplied by the render distance.
flgn.config.fogDensity.name: Fog Visibility
flgn.config.fogDensity.desc: The density of the fog - how opaque it is.
flgn.config.fogStartRain.name: Rain Start Multiplier
flgn.config.fogStartRain.desc: The amount to multiply the fog start by when it's raining
flgn.config.fogDensityRain.name: Rain Fog Visibility Multiplier
flgn.config.fogDensityRain.desc: The amount to multiply the fog density by when it's raining
flgn.config.enableCaveFog.name: Enable Cave Fog
flgn.config.enableCaveFog.desc: Whether to enable cave fog modifications.
flgn.config.caveFogColor.name: Cave Fog Color
flgn.config.caveFogColor.desc: The color of the fog in caves.
flgn.config.caveFogDensity.name: Cave Fog Visibility
flgn.config.caveFogDensity.desc: The density of the fog in caves - how opaque it is.
flgn.config.disableAll.name: Disable All Functionality
flgn.config.disableAll.desc: Disables all fog modifications applied by Fog Looks Good Now, useful if you want to temporarily disable fog modifications or make comparisons before and after the mod is applied.
